scripts.packageSdk: (yarn unlink mule-sdk-js && echo 'no link') && rm -rf ./node_modules/mule-sdk-js && yarn add nik0kin/mule-sdk-js#v3 --no-lockfile
scripts.devSdk: (yarn unlink mule-sdk-js && echo 'no link') && rm -rf ./node_modules/mule-sdk-js && yarn link mule-sdk-js
scripts.reMockSdk: yarn run packageSdk && yarn run buildMockSdk && yarn run useMockSdk
scripts.restartMockSdk: yarn run packageSdk && yarn run buildMockSdk && yarn run useMockSdk && yarn start
scripts.restartDevMockSdk: yarn run devSdk && yarn run buildMockSdk && yarn run useMockSdk && yarn start
scripts.build: react-scripts-ts build && rm -r dist/frontend && mv build dist/frontend
